thread.title: BRIEF-Ameriserv Financial Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.10

title: BRIEF-Ameriserv Financial Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.10
text:
April 17, 2018 / 12:08 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Ameriserv Financial Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.10 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 17 (Reuters) - Ameriserv Financial Inc: 
* AMERISERV FINANCIAL REPORTS HIGHER 2018 FIRST QUARTER EARNINGS AND ANNOUNCES AN INCREASED QUARTERLY COMMON STOCK CASH DIVIDEND * INCREASES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND BY 33 PERCENT 
* BOARD DECLARED A $0.02 PER SHARE QUARTERLY COMMON STOCK CASH DIVIDEND 
* NET INTEREST INCOME IN THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 INCREASED BY $27,000, OR 0.3%, FROM THE PRIOR YEARâ€™S FIRST QUARTER. 
* QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME AFTER PROVISION FOR LOAN LOSSES $8.7 MILLION VERSUS $8.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
